title: County Republicans to hold drawing
content:
Idaho Idaho County Republican Central Committee is holding a drawing Tuesday,
November 17, 2015.  1st prize is a DPMS AR-15 Oracle; 2nd prize is
a Ruger 22 Charger; 3rd prize is a brick of 22 ammo.  Guest speaker
that night will be Greg Pruett from the Idaho 2nd Amendment Alliance. 
Contact any committee member for tickets or call Donna at 208-962-3561.
You just might be the winner!
